r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $26.6M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Corporation Du Fort St Jean. The average
  contract duration was 5.63 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $147.3M. The longest
  contract was 16.66 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $441.7M.
lookup_name: 'CORPORATION DU FORT ST JEAN'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '26.6M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '33%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '314%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '4'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '335.0M'
s424_mean_duration: '5.63'
s421_mean_contract_value: '147.3M'
s425_max_duration: '16.66'
s422_max_contract_value: '441.7M'
